|brand = Amazon |model = Echo Show |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 5 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = C76N8S |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = IoT hub, wireless speaker system |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AXW2-3476 |icid = 26819-3476 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT8163; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107:P; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 90:23:5B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 5.0, MU-MIMO, screen, Camera 2MP, speaker, Alexa support |addchip = PMIC;MediaTek;MT6323;;1;,,, Low-Power Stereo ADC w/Embedded miniDSP;TI;TLV320ADC3101;;1;,,, 20V Digital Input Class-DG Amplifier;Maxim;MAX98396;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/12/2021 |estreldate = 06/2021 |estprice = 85 |upc = 840080503356 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08J8FFJ8H |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7668; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "KC19-TI MLB", "V4.0" and "PN:01042JN00-35K-G" are silkscreened on main board. :"KC19 IO BD", "Ver:2.0" and "PN:01042HD00-42T-G" are silkscreened on power/usb board. :"KC19 MIC BD", "Ver:2.0" and "PN:01042HE00-42T-G" are silkscreened on microphone board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT8163 @1.3GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-T720 MP2'' @520MHz (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenCL 1.1, DX11) *Storage: 8GB eMMC 5.1 MLC Flash *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7668 :MU-MIMO 802.11abgn/ac Dual-Band 2.4/5GHz + BT 5.0 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) port *Power Source: 12V 1.25A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/amazon-echo-show-5-2nd-gen-2021-release ''Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen, 2021 Release) Review'' on '''PC Mag'''] *[https://www.techradar.com/reviews/amazon-echo-show-5-2nd-generation ''Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd generation) review'' on '''TechRadar'''] *[https://www.androidcentral.com/amazon-echo-show-5-2nd-gen-review ''Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen) review' on '''Android Central'''] *[https://www.briandorey.com/post/echo-show-5-2nd-gen-smart-display-teardown ''Amazon Echo Show 5 2nd Gen Smart Display Teardown'' on '''Brian Dorey''' blog]
==See also== :;[[Amazon Echo Devices]] • [[Amazon Fire TV Devices]] *Amazon Echo (4th Gen) • Spherical design with rich sound, smart home hub, and Alexa *Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen, 2022) with Clock • Smart speaker with clock and Alexa *Amazon Echo Plus (2nd Gen) • Smart home hub with spherical design and Alexa *Amazon Echo Show 8 (2nd Gen, 2021) • HD smart display with Alexa and 13MP camera *Amazon Echo Show 5 (2nd Gen, 2021) • Smart display with Alexa and 2MP camera *Amazon Echo Glow • Multicolor smart lamp for kids, compatible Alexa device *Echo Sub • Powerful subwoofer for Echo, requires compatible Echo device *Echo Studio • Smart speaker with Dolby Atmos, spatial audio and Alexa *Amazon Smart Plug • Smart Plug for home automation, works with Alexa
[[Category:Internet of things]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
